statements: SELECT * FROM CitizenFeedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3;
SELECT complaint_text, feedback_rating FROM CitizenFeedback WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT citizen_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM CitizenFeedback GROUP BY citizen_id HAVING total_feedback > 2;
SELECT * FROM CitizenFeedback WHERE complaint_text ILIKE '%poor%' ORDER BY feedback_rating ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(feedback_rating) AS avg_rating FROM CitizenFeedback;
SELECT * FROM CitizenFeedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT citizen_id, complaint_text FROM CitizenFeedback WHERE feedback_rating < 2;
SELECT id, feedback_rating, timestamp FROM CitizenFeedback WHERE citizen_id = 5 ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM CitizenFeedback WHERE complaint_text LIKE '%important%' AND feedback_rating = 5 ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CitizenFeedback WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE complaint_type = 'Noise'
SELECT citizen_id, complaint_type, complaint_description FROM complaints WHERE citizen_id = 123
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE service_department = 'HR' ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_rating, feedback_comment FROM feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3
SELECT citizen_id, MAX(feedback_rating) AS highest_rating FROM feedback GROUP BY citizen_id
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE complaint_type = 'Noise Complaint';
SELECT citizen_id, complaint_date, complaint_type FROM complaints WHERE citizen_id = 12345 ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_rating, feedback_date, feedback_comment FROM feedback WHERE service_department = 'Customer Support' AND feedback_rating >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT citizen_id, complaint_type FROM complaints WHERE complaint_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE feedback_rating = (SELECT MAX(feedback_rating) FROM feedback);
SELECT * FROM CitizenComplaints;
SELECT citizen_name, complaint_type FROM CitizenComplaints WHERE complaint_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT citizen_name, complaint_type, complaint_date FROM CitizenComplaints WHERE citizen_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM PublicServices ORDER BY service_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM Feedback WHERE citizen_name = 'Jane Smith' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT citizen_name, complaint_type, complaint_date FROM CitizenComplaints WHERE complaint_type = 'Water Leakage' ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CitizenComplaints WHERE complaint_type LIKE '%Noise%' ORDER BY citizen_name ASC;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM PublicServices WHERE service_name IN ('Water Supply', 'Electricity', 'Garbage Collection') ORDER BY service_name;
SELECT feedback_id, citizen_name, feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;

SELECT * FROM CitizenComplaints JOIN Feedback ON CitizenComplaints.citizen_name = Feedback.citizen_name WHERE CitizenComplaints.complaint_type = 'Bad Service' AND Feedback.feedback_text LIKE '%improved%' ORDER BY CitizenComplaints.complaint_date ASC, Feedback.feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Citizens;
SELECT name, address FROM Citizens WHERE citizen_id = 1;
SELECT department_name FROM Departments ORDER BY department_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Complaints WHERE department_id = 2 AND citizen_id = 3;
SELECT feedback_text, department_id FROM Feedback WHERE citizen_id = 4 ORDER BY department_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Citizens JOIN Complaints ON Citizens.citizen_id = Complaints.citizen_id;
SELECT c.name, d.department_name, Com.complaint_text FROM Citizens c JOIN Complaints Com ON c.citizen_id = Com.citizen_id JOIN Departments d ON Com.department_id = d.department_id;
SELECT f.feedback_text, c.name FROM Feedback f JOIN Citizens c ON f.citizen_id = c.citizen_id;
SELECT d.department_name, COUNT(Com.complaint_id) AS num_complaints FROM Departments d LEFT JOIN Complaints Com ON d.department_id = Com.department_id GROUP BY d.department_name;
SELECT c.name, COUNT(f.feedback_id) AS num_feedbacks FROM Citizens c LEFT JOIN Feedback f ON c.citizen_id = f.citizen_id GROUP BY c.name ORDER BY num_feedbacks DESC;
SELECT * FROM complaints;
SELECT citizen_id, complaint_text FROM complaints WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT full_name, address, phone_number FROM citizens ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT department_name, location FROM departments WHERE location='City Center';
SELECT service_name, department_id, description FROM services LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, address, phone_number FROM citizens WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT complaint_text, status FROM complaints ORDER BY complaint_id DESC;
SELECT department_name, location FROM departments WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT service_name, description FROM services WHERE department_id = 2;
